thread.title: TRUSTe and Rackspace Collaborate to Strengthen Online Privacy Compliance in Cloud Services
thread.title_full: TRUSTe and Rackspace Collaborate to Strengthen Online Privacy Compliance in Cloud Services

author: admin
title: TRUSTe and Rackspace Collaborate to Strengthen Online Privacy Compliance in Cloud Services
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/30/2015 @ 9:45 AM   TRUSTe 
LAS VEGAS, Sept. 30, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Today TRUSTe, the leading data privacy management company announced a joint referral partner relationship with Rackspace the #1 managed cloud company, to bring increased access to privacy technology and compliance services to Rackspace's broad global client base. 
Announcing the referral partner relationship in Las Vegas at the Privacy Security Risk 2015 conference Chris Babel CEO TRUSTe said: 
"This relationship is an indication of the growing awareness of privacy as a business differentiator within the cloud services industry. This referral relationship will provide Rackspace's customers with access to a wide range of privacy compliance technology and services from publisher compliance packages for behavioral ads, cookie consent solutions and platform privacy certifications." 
Perry Robinson, VP and GM of Rackspace Managed Security commented: "Rackspace continues to expand its partner network with leaders in privacy and security to provide our clients with options for additional services on top of leading cloud platforms to help our clients address evolving risks and threats. Our relationship with TRUSTe enables Rackspace to bring new privacy technology and capabilities to our customers." 
Rackspace chooses TRUSTe Assessment Manager 
Further confirming Rackspace's commitment to strong privacy practices, Rackspace is now the latest global company to choose TRUSTe's automated assessment technology to bring increased efficiencies to their privacy program management. Assessment Manager is the most recent module in TRUSTe's industry leading Data Privacy Management (DPM) Platform that is used by over 1,000 companies worldwide for ongoing privacy risk management and compliance. 
TRUSTe Assessment Manager is available as a standalone offering or as a module within the TRUSTe DPM Platform. Assessment Manager Pro Packages are available starting at $1,000 a month for a single seat license based on an annual contract. 
For more information, visit Assessment Manager . To request a personal demo, contact TRUSTe at 1-888-878-7830 or if you're at Privacy.Security.Risk. 2015 in Las Vegas this week, stop by booth #30 and ask for a demo. 
About TRUSTe 
TRUSTe powers privacy compliance and trust by enabling businesses to use data across their customer, employee and vendor channels. We have nearly 20 years experience and a team of over 150 professionals dedicated to providing data privacy management solutions and services, including assessments, certifications and our SaaS-based Platform. The Data Privacy Management Platform provides control over all phases of privacy; from conducting assessments and implementing compliance controls to managing ongoing monitoring. Companies worldwide rely on TRUSTe to minimize compliance risk and protect their brand. See http://www.truste.com 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/truste-and-rackspace-collaborate-to-strengthen-online-privacy-compliance-in-cloud-services-300151760.html 
SOURCE TRUSTe
